definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
suffix of a noun of locality
smooth talker/fast talker/slick and sociable person/person in the news
erhua variant of 花邊|花边[hua1 bian1]

sentences.english: The fringelike fimbriae transport ovulated eggs from the ovarian surface to the infundibulum.
sentences.chinese: 花邊狀的傘將排出的卵，從卵巢表面運送到漏斗。

sentences.english: Go all out with a lace dress and vampy lipstick for a Saturday night out.
sentences.chinese: 星期六晚上，穿上花邊禮服，塗上vampy口紅。

sentences.english: Beautiful and delicacy glass-yarn lace, welcome to inquiry.
sentences.chinese: 精美玻璃紗花邊，歡迎訂購。

sentences.english: Lace-up closure provides a secure and snug fit.
sentences.chinese: 花邊關閉提供一個安全和舒適的貼合。

sentences.english: The city has long been a center for the manufacture of textiles, lace, and hosiery.
sentences.chinese: 這城市長期爲紡織，花邊和針織內衣的製造業中心。

sentences.english: From the table-top, the lace coverings.
sentences.chinese: 桌面上，沒有了花邊檯布。

sentences.english: She told me to make a doilies to help ease myself every time I got angry at you.
sentences.chinese: 她讓我每次生你的氣時做一塊花邊桌墊來幫我消氣。

sentences.english: She was as usual disentangling her eyeglasses, which had got caught in her lace tie.
sentences.chinese: 她像往常一樣把掛在她花邊領結裏的眼鏡解下來。

sentences.english: Lace-up closure with single hook-and-loop ankle strap to keep your laces tucked.
sentences.chinese: 關閉花邊單鉤環踝帶，以保持你的鞋帶藏。

sentences.english: Replacing slippery laces or changing your Shoelace Knot are better alternatives.
sentences.chinese: 更換滑花邊或變更您的鞋帶結是更好的選擇。

sentences.english: Lace-up closure for easy on and off.
sentences.chinese: 花邊容易打開和關閉的關閉。

sentences.english: She wore a murrey-coloured gown with a little lace collar .
sentences.chinese: 她穿了一件帶花邊小領子的黑紫色長袍。

sentences.english: is designed to be simple, not too complicated lace or fold.
sentences.chinese: 婚紗設計要簡約大方，不能有過於冗雜的花邊和褶皺。

sentences.english: The dress is ornamented / adorned with lace.
sentences.chinese: 這條裙子被加上了一個花邊。

sentences.english: The result was good, but I tough that that specularity of the lace wasn't strong enough.
sentences.chinese: 其結果是好的，但我認爲的花邊泛着不夠有力。

sentences.english: She let a piece of lace into a dress .
sentences.chinese: 她在衣服上鑲入一塊花邊。

definition: all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
